title: Quarkus 3.0.0.Beta1 released
content: It is our pleasure to announce the availability of Quarkus 3.0.0.Beta1. We plan to release Quarkus 3.0.0.CR1 next week so now is a good time for testing the migration of your applications to Quarkus 3 (see below for more information about upgrading). Among a lot of bugfixes and small enhancements,...
